ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Contains the Markov cluster algorithm (MCL) for identifying clusters in networks and graphs. The algorithm simulates random walks on a (n x n) matrix as the adjacency matrix of a graph. It alternates an expansion step and an inflation step until an equilibrium state is reached.

Contains the Markov cluster algorithm (MCL) for identifying clusters in networks and graphs. The algorithm simulates random walks on a (n x n) matrix as the adjacency matrix of a graph. It alternates an expansion step and an inflation step until an equilibrium state is reached.

name: r-mcl
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mcl
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/MCL_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/MCL/MCL_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3193ebeca9dc2c198354825e8fd9b47d67bd961a339a7f4f81459406378166f0

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1006
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-expm
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-expm

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('MCL')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('MCL')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=MCL
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: Contains the Markov cluster algorithm (MCL) for identifying clusters in networks and
    graphs. The algorithm simulates random walks on a (n x n) matrix as the adjacency
    matrix of a graph. It alternates an expansion step and an inflation step until an
    equilibrium state is reached.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
